means.word_mean: 1. a weight of 28 pounds; sometimes imposed as a handicap in a horse race (such as a steeple chase or hurdle race)
2. an amateur boxer who weighs no more than 148 pounds
4. a professional boxer who weighs between 141 and 147 pounds
